#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int testcases=1,n,i;
	scanf("%d",&testcases);
	while(testcases--)
	{	
		scanf("%d",&n);	
	//	printf("%d",n-26);	
	//	n=n%10;
	//	printf("switch entery %d\n",n%25);
		switch(n%25)
		{
			
		//	case 0:printf("zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
		//	case 25:printf("zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 24:printf("yxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 23:printf("xwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 22:printf("wvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 21:printf("vutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 20:printf("utsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 19:printf("tsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 18:printf("srqponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 17:printf("rqponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 16:printf("qponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 15:printf("ponmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 14:printf("onmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 13:printf("nmlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 12:printf("mlkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 11:printf("lkjihgfedcba");break;
			case 10:printf("kjihgfedcba");break;
			case 9:printf("jihgfedcba");break;
			case 8:printf("ihgfedcba");break;
			case 7:printf("hgfedcba");break;
			case 6:printf("gfedcba");break;
			case 5:printf("fedcba");break;
			case 4:printf("edcba");break;
			case 3:printf("dcba");break;
			case 2:printf("cba");break;
			case 1:printf("ba");break;
			case 0:break;			
		}
	//	printf("%d",n/25);
		for(i=0;i<n/25;i++)
			printf("zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");
		if(n==0)
			printf("a\n");
		else	
			printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
